Title: Relates to witnesses to a health care proxy and the crime of forgery in the second degree
Summary: Relates to witnesses to a health care proxy; changes the witness requirement for the health care proxy from two adult witnesses to one adult witness; makes an exception for persons who reside in mental health facilities by requiring such persons to have two adult witnesses; also includes falsely making or altering a health care proxy within the crime of forgery in the second degree.
LawCode: Amd ยง2981, Pub Health L; amd ยง170.10, Pen L
